short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display max bid, min ask and market value of the cards in your deck.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cards++ is a NationStates tool which display maximum bid, minimum ask and market value on the cards in your deck or when you open a new deck so that you don't have to check "info" and waste time.
